original_title: Sri Lanka shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka‘s shares edged up in mid day trade on Friday, Colombo Stock Exchange (CSE) data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.32 percent or 30.13 points to 9,338.00, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 0.28 percent or 7.55 points to 2,674.61
The market generated a turnover of 501 million rupees. (Colombo/June23/2023)
